title: r/Entitledparents Insane Mother Publicly Kicks A Child With a Broken Ankle!
description: r/Entitledparents They say you should never kick someone when they're down. Well, this entitled parent literally kicked a child while she was down. OP broke her ankle during a soccer game, and the entitled mom was so angry that her precious daughter would get red carded that she accused OP of faking the injury and kicked her ankle. That lady is lucky she didn't get clocked!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
